<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2635</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Free fall of an apple and a feather</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geben Sie Fall eines Apfels und der Feder frei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Libérez la chute d'une pomme et d'une plume</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Livre a queda de uma maçã e de uma pena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Liberi la caduta di una mela e di una piuma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελεύθερη πτώση ενός μήλου και ενός φτερού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Libere la caída de una manzana y de una pluma</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the fre fall of an apple and a feather as a result of gravitational forces, under normal conditions, and in a vaccum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die den fre Fall eines Apfels und 
der Feder resultierend aus Gravitationskräften, unter normale 
Bedingungen und in ein vaccum zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la chute de fre d'une 
pomme et d'une plume en raison des forces de la gravité, dans des 
conditions normales, et dans un vaccum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a queda do fre de uma 
maçã e de uma pena em conseqüência das forças gravitacionais, sob
circunstâncias normais, e em um vaccum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la caduta del fre di 
una mela e di una piuma come conseguenza delle forze gravitazionali, 
nelle circostanze normali ed in un vaccum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει την πτώση fre ενός 
μήλου και ενός φτερού ως αποτέλεσμα των βαρύτητας δυνάμεων, υπό
τους κανονικούς όρους, και σε ένα vaccum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la caída del fre de 
una manzana y de una pluma como resultado de fuerzas gravitacionales, 
bajo condiciones normales, y en un vaccum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attraction universelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gravitação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gravitazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
